concept.title: Significance of Typewriter Formatting
concept.shortdesc: The most important reason for formatting a manual typewriter is to ensure consistent, legible, and properly aligned text while typing.

section.title: Key Reasons to Fomat a Typewriter

ul.li: Readability: Formatting creates consistent margins and spacing for clear, easy-to-read text.
Visual balance: Even alignment prevents crowded or uneven lines on the page.
Professional appearance: Structured layout gives documents a neat and organized presentation.
Mechanical consistency: Formatting replaces digital alignment tools by defining physical typing boundaries.
Efficient page use: Proper margins and spacing optimize the available writing area.
Error prevention: Margin stops and bell indicators guide the typist and maintain structure.
